actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution directing the Secretary of State to provide certain information on Human Rights.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of State to report to the House of Representatives concerning human rights objectives and policies with respect to specified countries.

titles.title: A resolution directing the Secretary of State to provide certain information on Human Rights.
